      • not

        public static <T> Func1<T,java.lang.Boolean> not(Func1<? super T,java.lang.Boolean> predicate)
        Constructs a predicate that returns true for each input for which the source predicate returns false, and vice versa.
        Parameters:
        predicate - the source predicate to negate
        Returns:
        a function that returns a Boolean that represents an inversion of the logical effect of predicate
